main event: A citizen observed a lighted object, similar to a falling star, and perceived it as following him, with a rainbow-like glow revealing the outline of a World War I helmet.
interesting points: The object was initially described as having 4 lights that went off and on several times., A light was visible through a porthole surrounded by a bluish-green halo., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes, giving ample time for detailed observation., The witness reported the object appeared to be approximately 40 ft wide and 20 ft tall., The case was submitted 3 months after the sighting, making it too late for investigation.
sighted object: lighted object resembling a falling star with rainbow-like colors
witness description: A civilian who observed the object from the ground.
